p: Meat colour is one of the most important parameters that influence consumer's decision in buying, selecting, and acceptability of meat and meat products during display [ 27]. The addition of sweet basil essential oil improved (P < 0.05) the colour of the meat samples compared to control. The results revealed a significant breed effect in meat colour parameters (lightness (L ∗), yellowness (b ∗), redness (a ∗), and chroma and hue values in the meat samples across the storage days ( Table 3)).
